resources.string: My name is Dmitry. I am a second year graduate student at ITMO University. I study in the direction of Web technology.
I work as a mentor at HTML Academy on HTML and CSS courses level 1, level 2. Worked in Ontico.ru Front-end programmer.
In addition to studying, I am fond of 3D modeling and programming for microcontrollers.
No settings yet, wait for the update!

My plans for the near future:
Finish the last session, write two scientific articles on the topic of the dissertation, write and defend a dissertation. After graduation, I plan to work in the field of web development
In KGU, I received a bachelor\'s degree in automation of technological processes and produces.
My skills include designing automated lines, setting up cnc machines, etc.
After graduating from the ITMO Master\'s program, I will receive a master\'s degree in web technology.
My professional skills: creating highly loaded services, researching the web, and so on.
My dissertation is about progressive web applications.

A progressive web application is a technology in web development that adds opportunities for mobile applications to sites, transforms a site into an application, a hybrid of a site and applications for mobile devices, a product of the joint evolution of a mobile site and a classic native application.

Progressive Web Apps are user experiences that have the reach of the web\, and are\: Reliable \- Load instantly and never show the downasaur\, even in uncertain network conditions. Fast \- Respond quickly to user interactions with silky smooth animations and no janky scrolling. Engaging \- Feel like a natural app on the device, with an immersive user experience. This new level of quality allows Progressive Web Apps to earn a place on the user\'s home screen.
